name: Iron Ingot
description: A smelted chunk of iron. Strong and durable.

name: Wood Handle
description: A shaped piece of wood, ready to be attached to something.

name: Iron Key
description: This looks like it could open something important.

name: Leaf
description: Just a leaf. Not especially useful.

name: Mud
description: A handful of sticky brown goo.

name: Useless Blob
description: The result of mixing things that should not be mixed.
